channel.title: How to add duel arena?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm just wondering on how to create a duel arena. Just like the normal Runescape duel arena. What im wanting to do is make this a place for staking and having fun. I'm just not sure how to:
Challange Player. The staking/options interface. Making sure the options apply to the match. Making sure that the stake is awarded to the player. Adding a bank. Adding a alter.
If you could redirect me to a tutorial on how to do this that would be greatly appreciated :)

item.title: How to add duel arena?
item.dc:creator: @tarheels tarheels
item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:5, topic:383743”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=479506.msg3510864#msg3510864 date=1298550486]
If you don’t even know how to add a bank, don’t even attempt to try and program a duel arena in full.
[/quote]
^ yes

Back to subject.

  1. You do not even tell us what source you’re using.
  2. We are not going to spoonfeed you.
  3. Adding full duel arena is VERY difficult. It’s not copying and pasting a code in one place. It’s MULTIPLE.

I cannot help you because I don’t know what source you’re using.
I’m assuming you’re new to private servers due to you not knowing how to make the bank open up.
Thus, I don’t even think you know what source you’re using; Prolly just downloaded a pretty source.[/quote]

  1. Just ask me.
  2. Dont be a fucking dick.
  3. Well thats common sense, but thanks anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add duel arena?

item.description:

Clawz fury:

If you don’t even know how to add a bank, don’t even attempt to try and program a duel arena in full.

^ yes

Back to subject.

  1. You do not even tell us what source you’re using.
  2. We are not going to spoonfeed you.
  3. Adding full duel arena is VERY difficult. It’s not copying and pasting a code in one place. It’s MULTIPLE.

I cannot help you because I don’t know what source you’re using.
I’m assuming you’re new to private servers due to you not knowing how to make the bank open up.
Thus, I don’t even think you know what source you’re using; Prolly just downloaded a pretty source.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add duel arena?
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Spades:

A ton of people have tried, very little successful, 1% of the successful have done is half decent. I know of 1 person who has flawless Dueling without any dupes or bugs. I’d look around for a server that has it, and try fixing it from there. Starting from scratch from little knowledge would become frustrating.

/facepalm

Read full topic

item.description:
@tarheels wrote:

Hello, I’m just wondering on how to create a duel arena. Just like the normal Runescape duel arena. What im wanting to do is make this a place for staking and having fun. I’m just not sure how to:

Challange Player.
The staking/options interface.
